abstract: New Greek anti-austerity party Popular Unity has been given opportunity to form coalition government, but it is unlikely that move could avert third national election in 2015.
lead_paragraph: However, the new party’s chances of averting Greece’s third national election this year by doing so are seen as virtually zero.

headline.main: Greece: New Anti-Austerity Party Gets Chance to Form Coalition Government
headline.print_headline: Europe; Greece: New Anti-Austerity Party Gets Chance to Form Coalition Government

snippet: However, the new party’s chances of averting Greece’s third national election this year by doing so are seen as virtually zero.
